orego.ui

Class Orego

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.ui.Orego

  • public class Orego
extends Object
    Main class run by GTP front ends. Can also be run directly from the command line. Responds to GTP commands like "showboard" and "genmove black".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The version of Go Text Protocol that Orego speaks.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_GTP_COMMANDS

        public static final String[] DEFAULT_GTP_COMMANDS

      • GTP_VERSION

        public static final int GTP_VERSION
        The version of Go Text Protocol that Orego speaks.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PLAYER_PACKAGES

        public static final String[] PLAYER_PACKAGES
        Packages to try finding players in. If no class is found in the first, the second is tried, and so on. The last, empty string in this array allows the user to specify a specific, non-Orego package.

      • VERSION_STRING

        public static final String VERSION_STRING
        String to return in response to version command.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
